functionDecorators.name: convertSgnToSga
functionDecorators.description: Get the current SGR worth of a given SGN amount. function name is convertSgnToSga and not convertSgnToSgr for backward compatibility.

parameterDecorators.name: _sgnAmount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of SGN to convert.

parameterDecorators.name: _from
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the source account.

parameterDecorators.name: _to
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the destination account.

parameterDecorators.name: _value
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of SGN to be transferred.

functionDecorators.name: transferSgaToSgnHolder
functionDecorators.description: Transfer SGR to an SGN holder.

parameterDecorators.name: _to
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the SGN holder.

parameterDecorators.name: _value
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of SGR to transfer.

functionDecorators.name: exchangeSgnForSga
functionDecorators.description: Exchange SGN for SGR. function name is exchangeSgnForSga and not exchangeSgnForSgr for backward compatibility.

parameterDecorators.name: _to
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the destination account.

parameterDecorators.name: _value
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of SGN to be transferred.

functionDecorators.name: uponMintSgnVestedInDelay
functionDecorators.description: Upon minting of SGN vested in delay.

parameterDecorators.name: _value
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of SGN to mint.
